title: Remove empty `dependentRequired` object
description: `dependentRequired:{}` has no effect and should be removed.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: dependentRequired:{} is redundant
comprehensiveExamples.description: An empty object under dependentRequired has no effect.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Non-empty dependentRequired
comprehensiveExamples.description: Specifying required properties conditionally is valid.
